Package ca.phon.ui.ipa

Class DefaultPhoneMapDisplayUI

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
ca.phon.ui.ipa.PhoneMapDisplayUI
ca.phon.ui.ipa.DefaultPhoneMapDisplayUI
public class DefaultPhoneMapDisplayUI extends PhoneMapDisplayUI
Default UI for the phone map display. This class handles drawing and all input to the component.
